dashboard.name: Analysis Dashboard
dashboard.description: An interactive web application for data visualization with dynamic charts and customizable filters.

ecommerce.name: Clothing E-commerce Store
ecommerce.description: A complete e-commerce platform, with a shopping cart, checkout, and product management.

fitnessApp.name: Fitness App
fitnessApp.description: A multi-platform mobile app for tracking workouts and physical progress, with social integration.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: The site you're looking at now, built to be fast, responsive, and visually appealing.

api.name: Management API
api.description: A RESTful API for a task management system, with JWT authentication and Swagger documentation.

uxStudy.name: UX Study for App
uxStudy.description: User research, interface design, and prototyping for a new travel application, focused on usability.

bosch_apprentice.description: I worked as a Digital Solutions Apprentice at Robert Bosch for one and a half years. During this period, I worked full-time, dedicating half the time to internal company projects and the other half to technical training in Systems Development at SENAI Technical School.

bosch_intern.description: As an intern, I expanded my responsibilities in digital solutions development, collaborating on larger-scale projects and deepening my knowledge of modern web technologies and agile methodologies.

bosch_automation.description: Focused on process automation for the Human Resources (HRS) area, developing and implementing solutions to optimize workflows, improve efficiency, and ensure data integrity.

footer.text: Designed and built by Lucas Baccelli.
